name: Hexpdf
tagline: HexPDF is a simple Java class making it easier to use Apache PDFBox for creating pdf documents from your Java application or web-service.  HexPDF adds stuff like automatic page adding, word-wrap, newline awareness,  left/right/center text alignment, table creation and image insertion.
body:
Make it easy to generate pdf documents using Apache PDFBox as baseline.
Convenience functions for text, table, images and footes.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
